function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of funding and weak programmatic capacity","Impact":"Undermines vector control programs and inability to face new challenges","Mitigation":"Increased investment in strengthening programmatic capacity for surveillance and control","Technologies":"Improved surveillance and control technologies","People":"Public health authorities, vector control community","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Environmental change, insecticide resistance, and population growth","Impact":"Present pressing challenges to vector-borne disease (VBD) control","Mitigation":"Development of new vector control tools and strategies","Technologies":"New vector control tools, Wolbachia, genetically modified mosquitoes","People":"Public health authorities, research institutions","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"}]}
